question: How do I improve my brand’s visibility in AI search?
response:
Improving your brand’s visibility in AI-powered search—such as ChatGPT, Google’s SGE, Bing Copilot, Perplexity, etc.—now requires a strategy that’s a little different from traditional SEO. Here’s how to get started:

---

### 1. Build Topical Authority
- Create high-quality, in-depth content focused on your niche or industry.
- Cover a breadth of related subjects, answering questions your audience might have.

### 2. Optimize for Conversational Queries
- Use natural language and phrase content as answers to likely user questions.
- Incorporate FAQs, how-tos, and solution-focused articles.

### 3. Leverage Structured Data
- Add schema markup (FAQ, Product, Organization, etc.) to help AI and search engines understand your content and data relationships.

### 4. Focus on Entities & Brand Mentions
- AI models understand topics as “entities.” Make sure your brand is widely mentioned in contextually-relevant articles, directories, reviews, podcasts, PR, etc.
- Work to have your brand included in lists (“best X for Y,” “top tools for Z,” etc.).

### 5. Ensure Trust & Authority Signals
- Collect positive reviews across platforms.
- Encourage backlinks from reputable sources.
- Highlight awards, certifications, and press mentions.
- Use clear “About” and “Contact” pages, and display trust badges.

### 6. Keep Info Consistent & Updated
- Ensure your Name, Address, and other details are consistent across your website, social profiles, and review platforms.

### 7. Engage on Q&A and Expert Sites
- Answer questions on platforms like Quora, Reddit, StackOverflow (if relevant), and industry forums. AI scrapers often pull answers from these.

### 8. Monitor Your Brand Presence in AI
- Use tools or manually check how AI search assistants mention (or skip) your brand.
- Adjust your strategy to fill gaps when your brand isn’t appearing.

### 9. Optimize for Featured Snippets
- Aim to capture direct answers for “People Also Ask” boxes and rich snippets—AI often uses this data.

### 10. Technical SEO Still Matters
- Fast, secure, and mobile-friendly websites are still favored, both by traditional and AI-powered search.

---

#### Extra Tips
- Submit your brand to reputable directories and local listings.
- Participate in interviews, podcasts, and roundups to elevate brand mentions.
- Encourage satisfied customers to use branded keywords in their reviews and testimonials.
